section.p: ‘Ah, I see that you are a student of the arcane arts,’ says Oliphard the Wizardly. ‘There is something I need - if you can get it for me I will teach you how to advance as a mage. It was Vayss the Sea Dragon who turned me into powder. He stole my magic chest in which I store all my magical equipment. Without it, I am virtually powerless. Meet me in Trefoille when you have it.’
‘Why, in the Lake of the Sea Dragon, of course,’ he replies.
